text: The mzcli client is a downloadable JAR file ( mzcli.jar ), available from the Downloads dialog in the User Settings menu in Desktop. For details, see https://infozone.atlassian.net/wiki/x/yrT9F , then click on mzcli.jar to download it. You can run mzcli on any computer with Java installed and HTTP connectivity to the platform. For supported Java versions, see https://infozone.atlassian.net/wiki/x/szD8F . This section contains the following subsections: Using mzcli mzcli Commands mzcli Exit Codes mzcli Textual Pattern Matches
title: mzcli - MediationZone Documentation 9.4 - InfoZone
